name: UFC: Frankie Edgar Quiz | Sports Other | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was Frankie's first UFC fight against?
questions.explanation:
Tyson Griffin.

	In 2007, Edgar amassed a 5-0 record before trying out for season five of "The Ultimate Fighter". Edgar tried out in front of Dana White and Joe Silva, but was not selected to be on the show. However, a month later the UFC contacted Edgar and asked if he would accept a fight with fellow undefeated fighter Tyson Griffin at UFC 67.

questions.text: At which UFC event did Frankie capture the lightweight title?
questions.explanation:
UFC 112.

	In April of 2010, Edgar defeated Penn via unanimous decision (50-45, 48-47, 49-46) to become the new UFC Lightweight Champion.

questions.text: Who did Frankie fight at UFC: Fight Night 13?
questions.explanation:
Gray Maynard.

	Due to Penn's back to back loses to Edgar in 2010, Penn decided on a permanent move to the welterweight division. Edgar was the second fighter to defeat Penn in the lightweight division. The first was Jens Pulver.

questions.text: What was the outcome of Frankie's fight with Gray Maynard on January 1, 2011, at UFC 125?
questions.explanation:
It ended in a draw.

	At UFC 125 for the Lightweight title, the judges scorecards were 48-46 Maynard, 48-46 Edgar, and 47-47.

questions.text: At which UFC event did Frankie fight Spencer Fisher?
questions.explanation:
UFC 78.

	Edgar's fight with Maynard on January 1, 2011, marked the third time in UFC history that a championship fight ended as a draw.

questions.text: Who did Frankie fight at The Ultimate Fighter: Heavyweights Finale?
questions.explanation:
Matt Veach.

	On December 5, 2009, Edgar defeated Veach via rear naked choke at 2:22 of round 2. Their fight also earned Fight of the Night honors for being the best fight on the card.

questions.text: How did Edgar beat Mark Bocek at UFC 73?
questions.explanation:
TKO due to punches.

	On July 7, 2007, Edgar fought on the preliminary card. The main card was stacked. It included the championship fights in the middleweight and lightweight divisions. Edgar defeated Bocek via TKO (punches) at 4:55 of round 1.

questions.text: How did Frankie beat former lightweight champion, Sean Sherk?
questions.explanation:
Decision.

	On May 23, 2009, Edgar defeated Sherk via unanimous decision (30-27, 30-27, 30-27).

questions.text: At which UFC event did Edgar fight Hermes Franca?
questions.explanation:
Silva vs. Irvin

	On July 19, 2008, Edgar defeated Franca via unanimous decision (30-27, 30-27, 30-27). The fight was said to be an all out "war" and earned Fight of the Night honors. This gave both Edgar and Franca a salary bonus.

questions.text: At which university was Edgar an assistant wrestling coach?
questions.explanation:
Rutgers University.

	After Edgar went on to compete in the NHSCA Senior Nationals and take second place where he continued wrestling and qualified for the nationals all four years.
